catalogue_raissonne: Ogura, The complete woodblock prints of Yoshida Hiroshi, 1987, no. 56

inscription: LLC, in pencil: Fuji from Musashino | LRC, in pencil: Hiroshi Yoshida
markings: LLC, red artist\'s seal A: 博 {Hiroshi}
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Ten Views of Fuji (Fuji jukkei 富士十景)
provenance: Unknown when/where Harry Drake purchased, possibly Thomas French Fine Art
title: Musashino
